pages.text: ParCool has special jumping animation: $(bold)Diving$(). Let's see it by third-person view. In addition by pressing jump key again after a few seconds, Dive goes Sky-Diving.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Do $(l:parcool:actions/fast_run)Fast Run$()$(br)$(bold)2.$() Jump into enough space from a high place
